answers.answer: i went to 42 weeks before being induced.as long as there's not abnormal amount of amniotic fluid.to high or low. or baby gets to big.my doc would not induce.my fluid got to low and was induced at 42 weeks on first baby.42 weeks 2 days on second which ended up being emergency c sect because of fetal stress.
Crittermom21 did your babies measure big? How much did your babies weigh after you gave birth?
no they were normal 6.7 lbs and 7.11 lbs

question: Have any of you mommas with gestational diabetes gone past your 40 week mark? I hope my question makes sense. I have gestational diabetes and i have had no sign of baby wanting to come out any time soon and my belly feels soo heavy im so uncomfortable. My tailbone at night pops when i move from side to side. I'm sorry if it sounds like im complaining. Im 39+4 Today.
title: gestational diabetes and babies arrival
